name: oxfordMushroomCompany
description: Website for the Oxford Mushroom Company

scripts.postbuild:css: postcss -u autoprefixer -u postcss-pxtorem -c postcss.json -d dist/assets/stylesheets/ dist/assets/stylesheets/*.css
scripts.copy:images: rm -rf dist/assets/images && mkdir -p dist/assets/images && cp -R src/assets/images/* dist/assets/images/
scripts.test: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:css
scripts.prewatch: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:css
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:images & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js

author: feedMyPixel
